On Thu, Feb 18, 2010 at 11:02:33AM -0000, kristsi25 wrote:
> The ARFrontier never scaled well and has now been abandoned. 

That's too bad, but well... I can work around that using your pointers.

> Heritrix 3 is supposed to have some new facilities for this, although
> I haven't familiarized myself with them yet.
> I'd suggest you start here: https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Deduplication+Reduction+Processors
> Some of those features may be in Heritrix 2 

They are. :-) Well, The classes are. I will see if they are useable to
me. 

> but I would recommend upgrading to Heritrix 3.

This is on my ToDo-List, but I'd have to familiarize myself with the
code and then port all my custom-written modules, package it, adjust
some self-written scripts... 

Thanks for the helpful information!

Stefan
